document.query: CREATE TABLE `gotasty_payment_method` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `payment_type` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `value` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `created_at` datetime COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `updated_at` datetime COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

INSERT INTO `gotasty_payment_method` (`id`, `name`, `payment_type`, `status`, `value`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES (NULL, 'FPX Online Banking', 'FPX', 'inactive', NULL, '2023-08-22 09:00:00', '');

INSERT INTO `gotasty_payment_method` (`id`, `name`, `payment_type`, `status`, `value`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES (NULL, 'Manual Bank Transfer', 'ManualBankTransfer', 'active', NULL, '2023-08-22 09:00:00', '');
